name: @bcgov/citz-imb-common-code
//: SEE README FOR INFORMATION ON SCRIPTS

scripts.up:prod-local: npm run up:database && docker compose -f compose.prod.yaml up -d
scripts.down:prod-local: docker compose -f compose.prod.yaml down && docker compose down
scripts.install: npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
scripts.install:frontend: cd src/frontend && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm i
scripts.install:backend: cd src/backend && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm i
scripts.rebuild: npm run prune && npm run install && npm run up
